original_title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Runaway Kite
overview: There's a kite on the loose and Thomas needs to catch it before the wind blows it from Sodor!  With Gordon, Charlie, and Toby by his side, Thomas learns that a helping hand keeps him right on track when it comes to rescuing kites, saving a swarm of bees, and preventing railway disasters from taking flight.  Hop on board for a high-flying ride with Thomas and Friends in these train adventures!
title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas & The Runaway Kite
